name: Data Sync
description: Synchronize data from external databases to StarbaseDB's internal SQLite database
author: StarbaseDB

sync_interval.description: Interval in minutes between synchronization runs

tables.description: List of tables to synchronize (empty means all tables)

batch_size.description: Number of records to fetch in each batch

track_column.description: Column to track for incremental updates (created_at, updated_at, or id)
